participant_1.background:
My spouse is a therapist who helps me work through my issues.
I wake up early to feed my cats and then work on my laptops until it's time to get ready for my wedding in the park.
i sleep in a princess bed.
i have been cheated on by every ex girlfriend except for one.
sometimes i volunteer at an urban farm.

participant_2.background:
I like to dye my hair fire engine red, because it's bold and makes me feel like I can take on anything.
i have long hair for a boy.
i am a mother of two.
I enjoy the Fourth of July because my favorite color is red, white, and blue.
I'm not sure what my ethnicity is.

content.text: Hey! I'm a bit of a night owl, but I still wake up early to feed my cats and do some work on my laptops.
I'm more of a morning person, but I like to dye my hair fire engine red because it's bold and makes me feel like I can take on anything!
That's awesome! I love bold colors, I have a princess bed with a purple comforter and teal walls.
That sounds amazing! I love the color purple, it's so calming and relaxing.
I agree! I love to volunteer at an urban farm, it's a great way to spend time in nature and help out my community.
That's really great! I'm a mother of two, so I don't have much time for volunteering, but I love the idea of helping out my community.
That's great! I'm sure your kids are really lucky to have you as a mom.
Thank you! I try my best.
You seem like a really great person! It's been nice talking to you.
Thanks! You too! It was nice to meet you.
